description: DNase accessibility data for BLUEPRINT consortium immune cells included in eFORGE software tool

run_files.STUDY_NAME: BLUEPRINT DNase accessibility (NCMLS)
run_files.BIOMATERIAL_PROVIDER: Prof.dr. E. Vellenga, University Medical Centre Groningen - Department of Hematology

run_files.CULTURE_CONDITIONS: PBS supplemented with 1% PBA and antibodies: anti-CD45-PeCy7 (Beckman Coulter), anti-CD14-FITC (Beckman Coulter), anti-CD3-PC5 (Biolegend (ITK)), anti-CD19-ECD (Beckman Coulter) and anti-56-PE (BD Bioscience)

run_files.BIOMATERIAL_PROVIDER: Sanquin Blood bank, Nijmegen, the Netherlands
